document_data.title: Adventurer's Vault 2
document_data.author: [[Rob Heinsoo]], [[Eytan Bernstein]]
document_data.mainbody:
{{Quote|''This supplement for the D&D game presents hundreds of magic items, including legendary weapons and artifacts. Whether you're a player looking for a new piece of equipment or a Dungeon Master building a dungeon hoard, this book has exactly what you need.''}}
